00020 bool ServiceRepository::AddListener(ServiceRepositoryListener* Listener, bool NotifyOnlyNewEvents /* = false */ )
00021 {
00022     if ( Listener != (ServiceRepositoryListener*)NULL )
00023     {
00024         RepoListeners.Lock();
00025
00026         // Add listener and start its browse
00027         RepoListeners.AddTail(Listener);
00028
00029         RepoListeners.Unlock();
00030
00031         Listener->StartBrowse( NotifyOnlyNewEvents );
00032
00033         return true;
00034     }
00035
00036     return false;
00037 }
00038
00039 bool ServiceRepository::RemoveListener(ServiceRepositoryListener* Listener, bool NotifyAsIfExistingServicesDisappear /* = false */ )
00040 {
00041     bool Found;
00042
00043     if ( Listener == (ServiceRepositoryListener*)NULL )
00044     {
00045         return false;
00046     }
00047
00048     RepoListeners.Lock();
00049
00050     Found = false;
00051     for( RepoListeners.First(); RepoListeners.NotAtEnd(); RepoListeners.Next() )
00052     {
00053         if ( RepoListeners.GetCurrent() == Listener )
00054         {
00055             Found = true;
00056             RepoListeners.RemoveCurrent();
00057             break;
00058         }
00059     }
00060
00061     RepoListeners.Unlock();
00062
00063     if ( Found == true )
00064     {
00065         Listener->StopBrowse( NotifyAsIfExistingServicesDisappear );
00066         return true;
00067     }
00068
00069     return false;
00070 }
00071
00072 ServiceProxyList * ServiceRepository::GetAllServices()
00073 {
00074     ServiceProxyList * pList = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxyList;
00075     if ( pList == (ServiceProxyList *)NULL )
00076     {
00077         return (ServiceProxyList *)NULL;
00078     }
00079
00080     AutoDelete<DnsSdServicesList> ServList = DnsSdProxy::GetCurrentServicesList();
00081     if ( ServList != (DnsSdServicesList*)NULL )
00082     {
00083         DnsSdService * pServ;
00084         ServiceProxy * pSP;
00085         for( ServList->First(); ServList->NotAtEnd(); ServList->Next() )
00086         {
00087             pServ = ServList->GetCurrent();
00088             if ( pServ == (DnsSdService *)NULL )
00089             {
00090                 continue;
00091             }
00092
00093             pSP = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxy( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), pServ->HostName, pServ->Port, (ServiceProperties&)pServ->Properties) ;
00094             if ( pSP == (ServiceProxy *)NULL )
00095             {
00096                 continue;
00097             }
00098
00099             // Add it to the proxy list
00100             pList->AddTail( pSP );
00101         }
00102     }
00103
00104     return pList;
00105 }
00106
00107 // To be compliant with java API
00108 void ServiceRepository::Stop()
00109 {
00110     ServiceRepositoryListener * pListener;
00111
00112     // Remove all entry from my list and remove them from the DnsSdProxy
00113     RepoListeners.Lock();
00114
00115     // While we have ServiceRepositoryListeners
00116     while( RepoListeners.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00117     {
00118         pListener = RepoListeners.ExtractFirst();
00119         if ( pListener != (ServiceRepositoryListener *)NULL )
00120         {
00121             pListener->StopBrowse();
00122         }
00123     }
00124
00125     RepoListeners.Unlock();
00126 }
